definition: to discuss spiritedly (idiom)/tongues are wagging
to comment on/to discuss/to suggest
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

numerous/confused/disorderly

sentences.english: City wall top and bottom discusses in succession, coax noisy voice in, that white fog is pile up near.
sentences.chinese: 城墙上下议论纷纷，哄吵声中，那片白雾越来越近。

sentences.english: City wall altitude and base discusses in succession, coax loud voice in, that white fog is scale up close.
sentences.chinese: 城墙上下议论纷纷，哄吵声中，那片白雾越来越近。

sentences.english: They that sit in the gate speak against me; and I was the song of the drunkards.
sentences.chinese: 坐在城门口的人对我议论纷纷，我成了酒徒之歌。

sentences.english: Theories have developed about the reasons for the changes.
sentences.chinese: 为什么要进行这一变革，人们对其原因议论纷纷。

sentences.english: All circles is eristic in succession, official conclusion is the suicide.
sentences.chinese: 各界议论纷纷，官方结论是自杀。

sentences.english: Arius led the people, who were murmuring, toward the forest.
sentences.chinese: 艾利乌带着议论纷纷的人们朝那片森林走去。

sentences.english: The spot surrounded many people very quickly, everybody is eristic in succession.
sentences.chinese: 现场很快围了不少人，大家议论纷纷。

sentences.english: This mourning was noticed in the town, and commented on.
sentences.chinese: 城里的人都注意到他的丧服，议论纷纷。

sentences.english: “I never really felt it until people started calling up,” he said.
sentences.chinese: “知道人们开始议论纷纷，我才真正感觉到，”他说。

sentences.english: We are talking about, Joji monks scratching their heads.
sentences.chinese: 大家都议论纷纷，丈二的和尚摸不着头脑。

sentences.english: Users of the popular Twitter-like microblogging service Sina Weibo, on the other hand, had plenty to say.
sentences.chinese: 不过，新浪微博上的网友倒是对此议论纷纷。

sentences.english: The resignation of the editor in chief was remarked upon by all the staff members in the newspaper office.
sentences.chinese: 报社的职员对总编辑的辞职议论纷纷。

sentences.english: The person hears huge Hua, temporarily the discussion is in succession.
sentences.chinese: 人听闻大哗，一时议论纷纷。
